titleStmt.title: SII 14.234: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 234. (A.R. No. 291 of 1923.) TIRUKKŌSHṬIYŪR, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE STORE-ROOM IN THE SAUMYANĀRĀYAṆA-TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record is dated in the 13th year of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha and was issued from the throne called Kaliṅgattaraiyaṉ in the Aḻagiyapāṉdiyaṉ-kūḍam. From it we learn that the natal star of the king was Chittirai and that the king remitted certaintaxes on Aṇḍūr alias Nāṭṭārmaṅgalam and Puṟkuḻi in favour of the temple of Aḻagiyamaṇavāḷāḻvār in the east of the Periyalōyil at Tirukkōshṭiyūr for the conduct of a nine-day festival in the month of Aippaśi, ending with the day of the king's asterism, Chittirai.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
—..svastiśrī . tirumaṭantaiyuñ jeyamaṭantaiyun tiruppuyaṅkaḷi liṉitiruppa Irunila mum perumai Ey ntiṟaiñca māvile varumuṭicūṭit teṉkumariyum vaṭakaṅkaiyu
n tiraikkaṭalume yellaiyākap pārmuḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭaṉ vaḷara maṉṉiya virasiṁhāsa matikkulam viḷakkiya komutal koccaṭaiya panmarāṉa tribhuvaṉacca
kravattikaḷ śrīvallabhadevaṟku yāṇṭu patiṉmuṉṟāvatu keraḷaciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu devadāṉan tirukkoṭṭiyūr peri t tirunāḷ Eḻuntaruḷukaikku Innāṭṭu Aṇṭurāṉa nāṭṭārmaṅkala
mum puṟkuḻiyum variyiliṭṭu vanta tiruvāykkeḻviyum Uḷvariyum tirumukamum kaṭai Īṭum kalveṭṭuvikka veṉṟu pū ttrayaṉ nakkaṉ ṇaya ṉārāyaṇa nilamaṅkalamuṭaiya cāturmmā
ssya kāṅkassarvvakratukkaḷaiyum kāśśapaṉ nārāyaṇa caṅkaranārāyaṇabhaṭṭarāyiṉa Iraṭṭai māṭamuṭaiya kāṅka yum kalveṭṭuvikkaveṉṟu Aruḷicceyya Ivar kaḷ kaṇkāṇi
yāka Ivvūr taccācāriyaṉ tiruvaraṅkatevaṉ poṟcāttaṉāṉa tirukkoṭṭiyūrācāriyaṉaik koṇṭu kalveṭṭuvittapa kiyapāṇṭiyaṉ kūṭattup paḷḷippīṭam kaliṅkattaraiyaṉil Eḻu
ntaruḷi Iruntu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉapaṭi . keraḷaciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu tirukkoṭṭiyūr periya śrīkoyiliṟ kiḻaittirunilai nām piṟanta cittiraināḷ tīrtthamākak koṇṭu Oṉpatunāḷ tiruviḻā Eḻu
ntaruḷukaikkut tiruppaṭimāṟ ṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukkut tevatāṉam Iṟai miliyāka Iṟuppatāka Iṉṉāṭṭu puṟkuḻiyu kāṭcci mikutikkuṟaivu Uḷḷaṭaṅka vilaikoṇṭuṭaiyarāy Aṉupavi
ttu varukiṟa Aṇṭurum patiṉmuṉṟāvatu mutal Antarāyam Uṭpaṭat tevatāṉam Iṟai yiliyāka Iṭappeṟaveṇṭumeṉṟu ṉavaṉ maṅkalātarājaṉ namakkuc coṉṉamaiyil keraḷaciṅka vaḷanāṭṭut ti
rukkoṭṭiyūrp periya śrī koyiliṟ kīḻaittirunilai Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷaṟkku Aippikaittiruviḻā Eḻuntaruḷukaikku nām piṟanta cittirai nāḷ ruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka Innāṭṭu puṟ
kuḻiyum Innāṭṭu nāṭṭārmaṅkalamum Ivvāḻvār tirunāmattāl kārāṇamai miyāṭcci miku �ṟaivu Uḷḷaṭaṅka vilaikoṇ meṉṉum peyarālum yāṇṭu patiṉmuṉṟāvatu mutal Antarāyam Uṭpaṭa teva
tāṉam Iṟaiyiiliyāka ṅkeḻvippaṭiyum nam Olaippaṭiyum koyilile � vittukkoḷ ra mantiri tirumalaiyāṉa �kkirama pāṇṭiya Uttaramantiri Eḻuttu . Ivai muṉaiyataraiya ṉ Eḻuttu
This record is the order issued by the king as Kōṉerīṉmaikoṇḍāṉ and it relates to the document noted above, in continuation of which it is engraved.

koṉeriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ tirukkoṭṭiyūr mulaparuṣaiyāṟku . taṅkaḷūrp periya śrīkoyilk kiḻaitti kaikku nām piṟanta cittirai nāḷ tīrtthamākak koṇṭu Oṉpatu nāḷ Eḻuntaruḷukaikkut
ttiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka Innāṭṭu puṟkuḻiyum Ivvāḻvār kaṉmikaḷ nāṭṭār pakkal kārāṇmai nāṭṭār maṅkalamum yāṇṭu patiṉmuṉṟāvatu mutal Antarāyam Uṭpaṭat tevatā
ṉam Iṟaiyiliyāka variyiliṭṭu namvariyilār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum kāliṅkarājaṉ Olaiyum pe�kkāṭṭac coṉṉom . tāṅkaḷ Iv kum naṅkeḻvippaṭikkum nam Olaippaṭiyum cantirātittavaṟ celvatākak kalli
lum cempilum veṭṭuvittukkoḷka . Ivai parākkiramapāṇṭiya Uttara mantiri Eḻuttu .
In continuation of the above is the following copy, which gives publicity to the fact that some lands were made tax-free by the king for the purpose mentioned therein.

ttevar Iṟaiyili tāṉam śrī koyilil kiḻaittiru nilaiyil Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷāḻvār Aippikai mā
sattuc cittirait tirunāḷ tiruviḻā Eḻuntaruḷukaikku tiruppaṭimāṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka yāṇ Iṭṭa Iṉṉāṭṭu puṟkuḻi māṭai Eṭṭe kālum Innāṭṭu nāṭṭār pakkal Ivvāḻ
vār tirunāmattāl śrīpaṇṭārattu kācu kuṭuttu vilaikoṇṭa piramāṇappaṭi kārāṇmai miyāṭci mikutikkuṟaivuḷḷaṭaṅka Aṉu ṉṟe kālum Āka māṭai muppat toṉpataraiyum yāṇṭu patiṉmuṉṟāvatu muta
l Antarāyam Uṭpaṭat tevatāṉam Iṟaiyili Iṭṭamaikku Ivai puravuvari tiṇaikkaḷattu mukaveṭṭi poṉpaṟṟi Uṭaiyāṉ paṭṭālaka nāṭṭu Āṟṟūruṭaiyāṉ Arai yaṉ caṅkaratevaṉāṉa paḻantivarājaṉ Eḻuttu ....
Ivai puravuvari tiṉaikkaḷanāyakam tuṟumuruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari tiṇaik kaḷattu mukaveṭṭi karantaikuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai ṉāṉa colai Araicaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari tiṉaikkaḷanāyakam māyalūruṭai yāṉ E
ḻuttu . Ivai puravu vari tiṇaikkaḷanāyakam paṉaṅkāṭi Uṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari tiṉaikkaḷanāyakam poṉpeṟṟi Uṭaiyāṉ Araiyaṉ laik kūṟṟattu veḷḷuruṭaiyāṉ Araiyaṉ vaittavāṉporuḷ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari
tiṉaikkaḷanāyām vaṭacaḷavaḻi nāṭṭu tirumāṟaṉūruṭaiyāṉ cuntaraṉ peṟṟāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai puravuvari tiṉaikkaḷattu mukaveṭṭi ceruppāḻ ruṣaiyār karaṇam paṇikka kāliṅkarājaṉ Aṟivittatāvatu taṅkaḷūrp periya śrī
koyilk kiḻaittiru nilaiyil Aḻakiya maṇavāḷāḻvār Aippikai māsattuc cittirait tirunāḷ tiruviḻā Eḻuntaruḷukaikku tiruppaṭimā kkum yāṇṭu patiṉmuṉṟāvatu mutal Antarāyamuṭpaṭa tevatāṉam Iṟaiyiliyākavu
m Innāṭṭu nāṭṭār pakkal Ivvāḻvār śrī paṇṭārattu kācukuṭuttut tirunāmat tāl vilaikoṇṭuṭaiyarāy Aṉupavittu varukiṟa Aṇ Ivvāṇṭu mutal Antarāyam Uṭpaṭa tevatāṉam Iṟaiyiliyāy Iṟuppatāka
tiruvāy moḻintaruḷiya prasātañ ceytaruḷiṉa tirumukamum puravuvariyār Eḻuttiṭṭa Uḷvariyum pontatu Ivvūrkaḷ kaikkoṇṭu ka Ivai puravuvari tiṉaikkaḷanāyakam veḷiyāṟṟūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai
kāliṅkarāyaṉ Eḻuttu .....
Digital edition of SII 14.234 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
